虸字的基本解释

虸
zǐ
〔虸蚄（
f乶g ）〕古书上说的一种吃庄稼叶的害虫，如“榆关有虸虸虫，延入平州界。”

虸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǐ］
［《廣韻》即里切，上止，精。］
见“虸蚄”。

虸字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　虸； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页1076第36
【唐韻】卽里切【集韻】祖似切，?音子。虸蚄，蟲名。害稼。【齊民要術】《汜勝之術》曰：牽馬，令就穀堆食數口，卽以馬踐過爲種，無虸蚄蟲也。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yu
zǐ
〔虸蚄(
f 乶g)] A pest that eats crop leaves in ancient books, such as "Yuguan has hornworms, which extend into the Pingzhou boundary."
Yu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǐ］
["Guangyun" means inside cutting, top stop, fine. ]
See "虸蚄".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　虸; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 1076 Page 36
[Tang Yun] 卽里切 [Ji Yun] The ancestor is like cutting,? Yinzi.虸蚄, the name of the insect. Harm the crops. [Qi Min Yaoshu] "The Art of Victory" says: Lead a horse, make a few mouthfuls of grain, and use a horse to practice it as a seed, and there will be no worms.
